TopicTitle: Game running very very choppy on startup

Articles.Content:
Ok so when I deleted my 0.90 install and went to download and unzip my 1.0 install when I started the game up, it started running very choppy, not like lagging, but it was very choppy. It was a fresh install and no mods or anything. I have a decently powerful gaming PC so yeah. In my 0.90 install I had the settings default and it ran fine. I had been playing 0.90 and 1.0 on and off, but I had 1.0 uninstalled (who knows why.) and just installed it. Now if I try to go into 0.90 and play it still does the exact same thing.

SPECS:

Processor: AMD FX(tm_-4300 Quad-core Processor

3.80ghZ

RAM: 8.00GB

Thats all, and if need I will provide a log. Then again this was a fresh install and I ran the game for 2 seconds on startup. I also tried reinstalling many times and it just won't do the trick.

Thanks for the help! -Myself

Here it is.

https://jumpshare.com/v/2PIV9tABExtT73eSycC2?b=hcYqSmIc1omdrWqQOMBw

Not on dropbox because I was being lazy.

Hmm, it looks like your graphics driver is not installed.

GfxDevice: creating device client; threaded=1

Direct3D:

Version: Direct3D 9.0c [d3d10warp.dll 6.3.9600.17415]

Renderer: Microsoft Basic Render Driver

Vendor: Microsoft

VRAM: 256 MB (via DXGI)

You can get Nvidia drivers here, AMD drivers here and Intel drivers here.
No probs, oh and you might need to reboot after installing, to make sure the driver works properly.

Ok so now when I tried, for some odd reason the drivers didn't install even with my the driver CDs.

How can I explain this?

Nevermind I got it working.
